string-array.name: account_user_gender_name
string-array.item: Namiji
Mace

string-array.name: net_diag_err_link_quality
string-array.item: Haɗin Wi-Fi mara kyau. Canja band din mara waya ko sake kunna rauta.
"Ba'a iya isowa ga hanyar sadarwa. Sake hadawa zuwa Wi-Fi ko sake kunna rauta."

string-array.name: net_diag_err_link_quality_china
string-array.item: Haɗin Wi-Fi mara kyau. Canja band din mara waya ko sake kunnawa rauta.
"Can't access network. Reconnect to WLAN or reboot the router."

string-array.name: net_diag_err_network_connectivity
string-array.item: Ana buƙatar tanttancewa don samun damar hanyar sadarwa
"An taƙaita samun hanyar sadarwa. Daidaita lokaci akan wannan na'urar kuma duba saittunan hanyar sadarwar na'ura mai ba da hanya tsakanin hanyoyin sadarwa."
Kuskuren sadarwa. Binciki saittunan wakili na HTTP.
"Kuskuren hanyar sadarwa. Bincika idan na'ura mai ba da hanya tsakanin hanyoyin sadarwa zai iya shiga intanet."
"Ba'a iya isowa ga hanyar sadarwa. Sake hadawa zuwa Wi-Fi ko sake kunnawa rauta."

string-array.name: net_diag_err_network_connectivity_china
string-array.item: Ana buƙatar tanttancewa don samun damar hanyar sadarwa
"An taƙaita samun hanyar sadarwa. Daidaita lokaci akan wannan na'urar kuma duba saittunan hanyar sadarwar na'ura mai ba da hanya tsakanin hanyoyin sadarwa."
Kuskuren sadarwa. Binciki saittunan wakili na HTTP.
"Kuskuren hanyar sadarwa. Bincika idan na'ura mai ba da hanya tsakanin hanyoyin sadarwa zai iya shiga intanet."
"Can't connect to the network. Reconnect to WLAN or reboot the router."

string-array.name: net_diag_err_network_dns
string-array.item: Kuskuren saba DNS. Duba saitin DNS na rauta.
Jinkiri da yawa na saban DNS. Binciki saitin DNS na rauta.
"Ba'a iya isowa ga hanyar sadarwa. Sake hadawa zuwa Wi-Fi ko sake kunnawa rauta."

string-array.name: net_diag_err_network_dns_china
string-array.item: Kuskuren saba DNS. Duba saitin DNS na rauta.
Jinkiri da yawa na saban DNS. Binciki saitin DNS na rauta.
"Can't access gateway. Reconnect to WLAN or reboot the router."

string-array.name: net_diag_err_network_latency
string-array.item: "Manyan jinkiri daga hanyar sadarwar lokal. Sake yi na'ura mai ba da hanya tsakanin hanyoyin sadarwa ko haɗi zuwa wata hanyar sadarwa"
Manyan jinkiri daga intanet. Bincika saittunan hanyar sadarwar mai ɗauka ko haɗa zuwa wata hanyar sadarwa.

string-array.name: net_diag_err_network_parameters
string-array.item: Canza daga statik IP zuwa DHCP

string-array.name: net_diag_err_network_protocol
string-array.item: "Kuskuren frotokol din hanyar sadarwa. Sake hadawa zuwa Wi-Fi ko ka sake kunna na'rar."

string-array.name: net_diag_err_network_protocol_china
string-array.item: Network protocol error. Reconnect to WLAN or reboot the device.

string-array.name: net_diag_err_network_rssi
string-array.item: Canza eriya zuwa wata mai ingantacciyar hanyar Wi-Fi

string-array.name: net_diag_err_network_rssi_china
string-array.item: Move to an area with better WLAN coverage

string-array.name: net_diag_err_network_topology
string-array.item: Binciki saittunan DHCP na rauta sai ka sake hadawa

string-array.name: wifi_diag_err_wifi_base
string-array.item: "An kasa kunna Wi-Fi. Sake kunna na'urarka ko sabunta ta zuwa sabon sigar sistem."
"An kasa gano wurin hotspot. Sake kunna na'urarka ko sabunta ta zuwa sabon sigar sistem."
Ba za a iya kunna Wi-Fi ba. Kashe Wi-Fi sai ka sake kunnawa ko ka sake kunna rautar ka.
"Wi-Fi ya katse akai-akai. Kashe Wi-Fi da sake kunnawa ko sake kunna na'urar ka mai ba da hanya tsakanin hanyoyin sadarwa."
"An kasa kunna Hotspot. Sake kunna na'urarka ko sabunta ta zuwa sabon sigar sistem."
An kasa kunna hotspot. Kashe yanayin jirgin sama kuma a sake gwadawa.

string-array.name: wifi_diag_err_wifi_base_china
string-array.item: "Couldn't turn on WLAN. Reboot your device or update it to the latest system version."
"An kasa gano wurin hotspot. Sake kunna na'urarka ko sabunta ta zuwa sabon sigar sistem."
"Can't turn on WLAN. Turn WLAN off and on again or reboot your router."
WLAN has disconnected repeatedly. Turn WLAN off and on again or reboot your router.
"An kasa kunna Hotspot. Sake kunna na'urarka ko sabunta ta zuwa sabon sigar sistem."
An kasa kunna hotspot. Kashe yanayin jirgin sama kuma a sake gwadawa.
